data.name: Figurine Scene Simulator: Silver Wrapper Franchise (NSFW)
data.detailed_description:
Please join us on Discord for support, offer feedback and SFW / NSFW examples.
https://discord.gg/PEpkp6m96b

The Silver Wrapper Franchise DLC adds 25 NSFW figurines across three collections:

  • Pin It Up - Classic and New Art Pinup Figurines.
  • Costume Party - Figurines made up in outfits ready to go to a Costume Party.
  • Night Out Dancers - A (growing) collection of male dancers.

Add figurines to scenes and pose them using hundreds of humanoid and custom animations. Add dialogs, props and procedural realism effects to them and save as characters to your portfolio you can re-use. Produce the scene with different frames, LUTs, skyboxes and more. Record your creation with built-in high quality Mp4, Jpeg and Gif capture.

This DLC is part of the base game, install for free through the franchise settings menu in Figurine Scene Simulator.

(Purchase the Silver Wrapper Franchise Premium Unlock to unlock additional variants and character customization options.)
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1799345/Figurine_Scene_Simulator_Silver_Wrapper_Premium_Unlock_NSFW/?beta=0

data.short_description: The Silver Wrapper Franchise DLC adds 25 NSFW figurines across three collections.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R90 3GB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC expands the base game with an additional NSFW focused franchise "Silver Wrapper".  

The figurine collections in Silver Wrapper are NSFW and nudity content focused, such as "Pinups" which shows female figurines in NSFW costumes with most including full nude variants. It also adds several adult themed animations which aren't in the base game.  

This content will grow during early access.

Note: While some artist's work ranges up to realistic, the engine rendering makes them more "doll" or figurine like than simulator quality.

If we add additional simulator type content, it will be included in this DLC.
